short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts Uzbek words from Cyrillic to Latin or from Latin to Cyrillic

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Uzbek language is written in Latin or Cyrillic. Sometimes it is necessary to change the text from one to another. In this case, this program will help you.
